title: "your friend gift pool is not large enought to recieve a mistery link"

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
I have been playing with my friend since 3-4 years ago and we gifted skins to each other without any problem.
Is this a bug? Or can someone tell me what happens with my friend account (pugs fiction)

replies.body: The messaging is super confusing in this case, but it comes up if you're [trying to gift a champ to someone who's already unlocked it](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115005959727--Apr-19-Gifting-Champions-with-IP-is-currently-generating-an-unrelated-error-message-this-will-only-occur-if-your-friend-already-has-the-champion-) on their own.  Check with your friend to see if they already obtained it to confirm.  Everything should be okay now!
